runs.name: main_Main
runs.task_description: Generate exactly one Python MODULE FILE at the target path "library_manager/main.py". The file MUST include the required imports declared in the manifest. The file MUST define exactly ONE top-level class with id "main.Main". The class MUST match the manifest: constructor signature, fields, methods, and imports as declared. Do NOT define any other classes in that file. Do NOT write any other files.

runs.name: main_Main__validator
runs.task_description: Validate the implementation at "library_manager/main.py" against the manifest (example/manifest/manifest.json) and the provided rules. Produce a validation report describing whether the file implements the class "main.Main" exactly as declared (constructor signature, fields, methods, and imports). Decide and state whether to: continue, rerun using one of the rerun methods (refiner or remake), or break. Provide explicit findings and suggested action.
